title: What happens next as China-made EVs investigated by EU?
description: EU members will vote on a proposal to impose tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles, with definitive tariffs potentially applying for five years. The European Commission continues negotiations with China and faces potential Chinese retaliation. Final decisions are due by October 30.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
